Name: WINDSHIFT
About the game: Land of Fire - A nation of vast lands, inhabited by worshipers of Fire God’s daughter, the divine ambassador. Situated on the fringe of the world and without national border security, year after year this nation unwillingly invites countless nomads. Among them is this man, Jinbei Kaname. ◇◇Game Overview WINDSHIFT is a game with elements of both a strategy battle RPG and an adventure. Note: Controllers supported 〇 Command Battle In command battle, the command selected affects the order of action. Commands that can be selected are basic attack, skill, defense, item use, and escape. Basic attack During a basic attack, you will attack with your equipped weapon. Weapons are given a critical hit chance. When you attack with a critical hit, a shock wave will be generated. Press the 'A' button to attempt to make a critical hit. Skill Jinbei, the main character, gains various skills by opening the 'Huusui plate '. Using the skill consumes MP but can deal more damage to the enemy than basic attacks. Companions learn skills by leveling up. Defense Prevent an enemy's powerful attack one time. When attacked, defense power increases. Item use Use the items you have. Escape Escape from the battle. In some cases you will not be able to escape. You cannot escape from boss battles. 〇 Actions you can take in the field Press the “X” button to display the menu. In the menu, you can confirm your status, equip weapons and armor, use items, open the Huusui plate, save and return to the title. There are many treasure chests in the field. You can collect items from the treasure chests with the 'A' button. About the town There are several towns and villages in this world. If you find them on the field you can go visit them. There are shops such as inns and item shops in the town. By talking to the townspeople you can acquire important information. Press the “B” button to dash. About the shop In the shop, you can buy and sell items and equipment. About the dungeons There are various dungeons in this world. Dungeons may have traps. Guide Jinbei well and avoid the traps to proceed. You can jump with the 'X' button. You can also double jump in the dungeon. About the Casino As you progress through the story, you can go to the casino. At the casino, you can play several mini games. Some items are only available as casino prizes. Make sure you try some of the mini games. About the limited-time events The game has many limited-time events. The event period and participation conditions will be announced on the STEAM community and our official Twitter. ◇Adventure The adventure scenes of this game are fully voiced in Japanese with English subtitles. The adventure part alone is over 2 hours long in total. Be sure to immerse yourself in our world of extraordinary stories, brought alive by Japan’s first-rate voice actors. ◇Game Length The average length is approximately 20 hours, which may look rather short, but this game has plenty of features to satisfy all kinds of completionists. We hope this game will be an addition to your long-time favorites. ◇End Credits Theme Song: «Suisei (Comet)» Performed by Saya Horigome Written, Composed and Arranged by KUM+ ◇character voice acter JINBEI KANAME・・・KIYOMASA ITOU SUMIRE HIMA・・・・YUZU NAYUKI OHATSU ・・・・・・SAYA HORIGOME RANKA・・・・・・・ASUKA ITOU ENGO ・・・・・・・TATSUNORI FUKUSATO PHOENIX・・・・・・KAZUKI YOKOTA CHIGUSA・・・・・・SAWAKO SHIRAKABE
